body: $ZIM Just info for anyone here who is wondering what's going on with short seller in the next 10 days. They do have to cover
created_at: pay interest on shares that they are borrowing. If they do not cover before Ex-dividend date. They will also have to pay to the share holders the amount of dividends X Shares.

body: For example if you own 1000 share and ZIM announce $3 dividend
created_at: the short sellers have to pay you $3000 out of pocket plus interest to borrow shares and the raising price of shares.
